snippet.title: Reimei no Gakuen
snippet.description:
PV for Reimei no Gakuen (Visual Novel, Otome, Modern Fantasy)

Support on Kickstarter: http://kck.st/2MkBcDd
Download the demo for free; https://raikon-kitsune.itch.io/reimei-no-gakuen
~~~~~~

Follow the project on;
https://twitter.com/RaikonKitsune
http://raikonkitsune.tumblr.com/
https://www.facebook.com/RaikonKitsuneArts/

❖❖Credits❖❖
Project Leader, Writer, Main Artist: Raikon Kitsune
Composer: Solo Acapello
Assistant Artist: Hana Kuro
Vocalist: Lunacy
Programming: Raikon Kitsune, 
dansylverstere, Haseo, Dovahkitteh
Engine: Ren'py
Proofreaders: Anihime,IronForPistons, Venom Wolf
Animation: KeiiPie
